file_content.text: Let us leave this place.
Wrath, finally--I am Servant Twelve. We're safe for the moment, but you must move quickly.
Master Gnost-Dural is here. He has come to capture the Emperor's Hand.
Gnost-Dural won't escape this fortress alive.
I will end him.
Just as the Emperor desires.
Where are your fellow servants?
Is the Hand safe?
They were incapacitated.
After losing the Voice, Gnost-Dural was bound to target you next. How did you not see this coming?
You should have been prepared.
Our attention was focused on Ziost.
Gnost-Dural's strike force emerged from hyperspace, countered our defenses, and seized the fortress with surgical precision. I retreated while they captured the Hand.
How terrible! Couldn't your guards stop them?
Interjection: Gnost-Dural timed his attack to coincide with the assault on the Voice.
When we were most vulnerable. Such a plot likely took years for the Jedi to perfect.
Where are the Hand's guardians?
Our sentries fell in the onslaught. Their sacrifice bought us time, which we are already wasting.
If this fortress is such a big secret, how did Gnost-Dural find you?
How did Gnost-Dural know where to find you?
Solid strategy, likely planned for months. But how'd he discover your coordinates?
A victory that sound wasn't won by chance. Somehow, Gnost-Dural knew about your fortress.
How'd Gnost-Dural track you down?
His source remains a mystery--not even Darth Vowrawn or Zujen Vale knew our location.
You must stop Gnost-Dural. If he fractures the Hand, we will lose our ability to revive the Emperor.
The Jedi have us outnumbered, but you know this fortress. Help me turn the tide against them.
Tell me what I need.
I'm plugged into our security systems and will stop at nothing to slow the Jedi's progress.
Why is the entire Hand required for the Emperor's awakening?
You can't revive him yourself?
You have no authority over me, servant. Obey my command, or our partnership is over.
I give the orders now.
Continue to serve the Emperor, and you may direct me as you see fit.
Gnost-Dural has penetrated our sanctum. With the help of his apprentice--a Jedi operative--he extracts the captive Hand to his docked ship.
Save the Hand, and I shall prime the fortress for incineration. The Emperor's will demands its destruction before the Jedi siphon more of his secrets.
Destroy nothing until I have brought Gnost-Dural under my heel.
Await my triumph.
Very well. But should you fail, the inferno will consume us both.
The Jedi aren't worthy of laying a hand on you. If trouble arises, run for safety on my ship.
[Flirt] Be careful.
Thank you, Wrath. But I can take care of myself.
You're the last free member of the Hand. Remain in hiding, and do not let the Jedi seize you.
Stay safe.
I will not reveal my presence until the time is right.
Your fanatic devotion to the Emperor will get you killed.
Forget the Emperor.
The Emperor is life. He cannot be forsaken.
Follow this passage, and stop Gnost-Dural and his apprentice before it is too late. I will join you once the Hand is secure.
May the Emperor give us strength.
His rejuvenation demands our combined energy. There is no other way.
